response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its immense worth to you, valued at $1,500,000, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a strategic price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, providing you with a substantial return on investment while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1350000}
